<<<<<<< HEAD
Seasonable reflections and discourses in order to the conviction & cure of the scoffing, & infidelity of a degenerate age by Jos. Glanvill ... Glanvill, Joseph, 1636-1680.
[16], 212 p.
Printed for R.W. for H. Mortlock ..., London : 1676.
Reproduction of original in British Library. Imperfect: t.p. illegible. Serm. I. The sin and danger of scoffing at religion -- Serm. II. The church's contempt from prophane and fanatick enemies -- Serm. III. Moral evidence of a life to come -- Serm. IV. The serious consideration of the future judgement.
=======
Seasonable reflections and discourses in order to the conviction & cure of the scoffing, & infidelity of a degenerate age by Jos. Glanvill ... Glanvill, Joseph, 1636-1680.
[16], 212 p.
Printed for R.W. for H. Mortlock ..., London : 1676.
Reproduction of original in British Library. Imperfect: t.p. illegible. Serm. I. The sin and danger of scoffing at religion -- Serm. II. The church's contempt from prophane and fanatick enemies -- Serm. III. Moral evidence of a life to come -- Serm. IV. The serious consideration of the future judgement.
H. Mortlock
R.W.
